# FANUC Alarms

> **Skill ID:** `prism-alarm-fanuc`
> **Category:** ALARM
> **Version:** 2.0.0

## Description

Complete alarm database and diagnostics for FANUC controllers

## Capabilities

- Look up FANUC alarm codes
- Provide FANUC-specific diagnostics
- Access FANUC service documentation

## Usage

This skill provides expertise in fanuc alarms.

### When to Use

- When working with alarm
- When needing fanuc alarms capabilities

## Dependencies

- `prism-error-catalog`
- `prism-controller-fanuc`

## Hooks

- `alarm:fanuc:lookup`
- `alarm:fanuc:diagnose`
